headline: Devon Energy (DVN): A Top Crude Oil Stock Among Hedge Fund Investors
summary: With 58 hedge fund investors in the Insider Monkey database at the end of Q1 2025, Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) is counted among the Best Crude Oil Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. headline: Analysts Estimate Devon Energy (DVN) to Report a Decline in Earnings: What to Look Out for
summary: Devon Energy (DVN) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
